h_s1_subtitle: Marketing Paradigm Shift through Blockchain Advertisement Platform
h_s2_p1: Get rewarded on interacting with Ads
h_s2_p2:
Connecting advertisers and consumers through 
 several exciting games and quizzes
h_s3_heading:
DonBangSeok quiz 
 event every week, 
 earn Brand Tokens!
h_s3_answer:
It's a blockchain-based brand-exclusive token for the winners of the 
 quiz event. Brand tokens allow you to purchase brand products and 
 their services.
h_s4_heading: IDC are rewarded when you post a review on your social media platform
h_s4_subheading: Post your brand token (MPS) reviews on social media platforms. You can earn IDC worth up to 5% of the amount used.
h_s5_subheading: Win IDC through fun DonBangSeok gamification, such as Best review, Lucky Roulette, Guess the price!
h_s6_subheading: Get paid to visit targeted ads
h_s7_text: SCAN THE QR, YOU WILL BE DIRECTED TO THE APP DOWNLOAD PAGE
team_title: Developed by Global Blockchain Expert Team
team_d: Head of Blockchain Business Division, iCraft Co., Ltd.
contact_enquiry: Leave your inquiry and a representative will contact you.
community_h: DonBangSeok community is working to change the landscape of the global advertising market.
community_subh: It facilitates to exchange opinions among users through various channels and improve the "DonBangSeok" platform.
community_channel_text: Follow us on social media channels
community_news_t: You can check out various events and news on the DonBangSeok platform
community_post_text1: [ICRAFT, launches a blockchain advertising platform that will shake up the online advertising market]
community_post_text2: [ICRAFT, Onboarding Korean franchise client on our platform]
community_post_text3: [ICRAFT, Onboarding Indian advertising client on our platform]
about_heading_1: DonBangSeok, the Emerging Blockchain based Advertising Platform
about_description_1:
Outstanding Quiz events, Gamification, Reviews, NFT, Video Ads, and  
Secure Short URL from DonBangSeok
about_heading_2: Problems in the legacy advertising market
about_subheading_2: Excessive advertising costs due to commissions, complicated settlement systems, and unreliable advertising data can be solved through new blockchain-based advertising platform 'DonBangSeok'
about_heading_3: Why DonBangSeok is right for your business?
about_subheading_3_1: DonBangSeok directly connects advertisers and users, reducing the involvement of middlemen and excessive commission.
about_subheading_3_2: By earning IDC through Vote and Earn, Guess the Price and Hit and Double it and more, users want to stay in DonBangSeok 24 hours.
about_subheading_3_3: Video ads and best reviews can be issued and purchased as NFT. With DonBangSeok, someone can own only one content in the world.
about_subheading_3_4:
With analysis of 'logs from Ads/Events participation and 
 user preferences', DonBangSeok AI is providing outstanding target Ads for each user.
about_subheading_4_1: User participation can be maximized through DonBangSeok's Gamification features.
about_subheading_4_2: Reviews and content can be created through various social media platforms, communities in which gives additional viral marketing effects for the advertiser's brand and products.
about_subheading_4_3: Advertisers can create and publish advertisements directly on the DonBangSeok platform without any middle man.
about_subheading_4_4: Advertisers are able to check the advertisement data in real time through advertiser's admin page.
about_subheading_4_5: Advertising costs are managed transparently through blockchain and settled in real time.
about_subheading_5_1: When a user participates in some advertiser's event/Ads or writes a review on the advertiser's product, IDC will be provided as the reward for such participation
about_subheading_5_2: Users receive IDC as reward for the use of DonBangSeok, and IDC can be exchanged for other cryptocurrencies or cash.
about_subheading_5_3: Using DonBangSeok's AI, we expose advertisements that can give more benefits to each users.
